comments.name: manideep
comments.body: React Router v6 introduces a Routes component that is kind of like Switch , but a lot more powerful. The main advantages of Routes over Switch are: All <Route> s and <Link> s inside a <Routes> are relative. This leads to leaner and more predictable code in <Route path> and <Link to>

comments.name: Cindy Beverage
comments.body: React Router v6 is a popular and powerful routing library for React applications. It provides a declarative, component-based approach to ...
